sources.title: Flesh and the Spur
sources.description: A young cowboy searches for the killer of his twin brother. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Flesh and the Spur (1956) WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: John Agar, Marla English, Mike Connors 
Director: Edward L. Cahn

When his twin brother is killed by an escaped convict, a farmer goes gunnin' for his brother's murderer, but his only clue is a stolen revolver that is part of a matched pair. Along the way, he teams up with a Native American damsel in distress, a notorious gunslinger (Mike Connors), and an old Wild West Show. 

One of the least-known of the American-International "B" westerns of the 1950s, Flesh and the Spur offers the spectacle of the inimitable John Agar in a dual role.
